package.name: net.sourceforge.projectfactory.client.grids
package.comment: Package that defines the grids used in the core application. This package does not generate any code.

grid.name: action:items
grid.comment: List of items defined within an action.

grid.name: action:recipients
grid.comment: List of recipients displayed within an action.

grid.name: action:steps
grid.comment: Displays the list of steps within an action.

grid.name: actionbar:items
grid.comment: Displays the panels attached to an action bar.

grid.name: actor:absences
grid.comment: List of absences made of a date, a duration with unit and purpose.

grid.name: actor:actors
grid.comment: Displays a list of actors.

grid.name: actor:emails
grid.comment: Defines a list of email addresses.

grid.name: actor:projects
grid.comment: Displays a list of projects with begin and target dates.

grid.name: actor:reports
grid.comment: Displays the list of actors who reports.

grid.name: actor:skills
grid.comment: List of skills.

grid.name: actor:teams
grid.comment: Displays a list of team with dates.

grid.name: businessprocess:tasks
grid.comment: Displays the list of tasks in a business process (template).

grid.name: class:classcontrols
grid.comment: Displays the list of controls for items in a class.

grid.name: class:items
grid.comment: Displays the list of items that are managed in a class.

grid.name: class:static:values
grid.comment: Displays static values to be defined within a class.

grid.name: combobox:items
grid.comment: Displays the list of items in a combobox.

grid.name: connexions
grid.comment: Displays the list of connected users.

grid.name: forecast:completed
grid.comment: Displays completed tasks in a forecast calendar.

grid.name: forecast:phases
grid.comment: Displays phases in a forecast calendar.

grid.name: forecast:sums
grid.comment: Displays a summary in a forecast calendar.

grid.name: forecast:weekly:assignment
grid.comment: Displays weekly assignements in a forecast calendar.

grid.name: forecast:weekly:tasks
grid.comment: Display weekly tasks in a forecast calendar.

grid.name: grid:items
grid.comment: Displays the list of items that define a grid.

grid.name: holiday:days
grid.comment: List of holidays made of a date, a duration with unit and purpose.

grid.name: panel:button:parameters
grid.comment: Displays the list of parameters to be used by buttons.

grid.name: panel:buttons
grid.comment: Displays the list of buttons that are attached to a panel.

grid.name: panel:items
grid.comment: Displays the content of a panel.

grid.name: plan:adjustments
grid.comment: Displays the list of tasks with adjustments within a plan.

grid.name: plan:anonymous
grid.comment: Displays the list of anonymous in a plan.

grid.name: plan:assignments
grid.comment: Displays the list of assignments to tasks within a plan.

grid.name: plan:constraints
grid.comment: Displays constraints on tasks within a plan.

grid.name: plan:events
grid.comment: Displays the list of events defined as part of a plan

grid.name: plan:phases
grid.comment: Displays the list of phases in a plan.

grid.name: plan:risks
grid.comment: Displays risks within a plan.

grid.name: plan:workloads
grid.comment: Displays the workloads within a plan.

grid.name: project:availabilities
grid.comment: Displays availability for actors within a project. This is defined by workday.

grid.name: project:scopeitems
grid.comment: Displays the list of scope items defined in a project.

grid.name: project:skills
grid.comment: Displays the skills of each actor assigned in a project.

grid.name: project:tasks
grid.comment: Defines the tasks in a project.

grid.name: project:teams
grid.comment: Displays the list of teams of a project.

grid.name: status:adjustments
grid.comment: Displays the list of tasks with adjustments within a status.

grid.name: status:items
grid.comment: Displays status items.

grid.name: status:phases
grid.comment: Displays phases in a status.

grid.name: status:risks
grid.comment: Displays risks within a plan.

grid.name: status:workloads
grid.comment: Displays the workloads within a plan.

grid.name: team:absences
grid.comment: Displays a list of absences for team members.

grid.name: team:members
grid.comment: Displays a list of team members with role, start and end dates.

grid.name: team:skills
grid.comment: Displays a list of skills by actor.

grid.name: tracking:items
grid.comment: Displays the items used for tracking.

grid.name: tracking:items:unscheduled
grid.comment: Displays the list of unscheduled items for tracking.

grid.name: tracking:tasks
grid.comment: Stores the list of tasks using for tracking.

grid.name: tracking:total:actors
grid.comment: Displays totals by actor of tracking data.

grid.name: tracking:total:tasks
grid.comment: Displays totals by task of tracking data.

panel.name: About
panel.comment: Displays information about the system.

panel.name: Action
panel.comment: Panel used in order to manage actions.

panel.name: ActionBar
panel.comment: Defines an action used to be available in the action bar.

panel.name: Actor
panel.comment: Panel used for actor definition, including absences, skills and contacts.

panel.name: Blank
panel.comment: Empty panel.

panel.name: BusinessProcess
panel.comment: Panel used for the definition of the business processes (template).

panel.name: ClassCode
panel.comment: Panel used to manage code attached to a class.

panel.name: ClassDefinition
panel.comment: Panel used in order to define classes and generate code.

panel.name: ComboBox
panel.comment: Panel used for the definitions of combo boxes.

panel.name: Connexion
panel.comment: Panel used in order to display active connexions.

panel.name: Dictionary
panel.comment: Panel used for the definitions of dictionaries.

panel.name: Forecast
panel.comment: Panel used for calendar forecasts.

panel.name: Grid
panel.comment: Panel used in order to define grids that are used in panels.

panel.name: HolidaySchedule
panel.comment: Panel used for holiday schedules.

panel.name: LocalHost
panel.comment: Panel used for the definitions of the local host or server.

panel.name: Location
panel.comment: Panel used for location definition, including timezone and workdays.

panel.name: Package
panel.comment: Panel used for the definitions of packages.

panel.name: Panel
panel.comment: Panel used in order to define panels, then generate code.

panel.name: PanelCode
panel.comment: Panel used to manage code attached to a panel.

panel.name: Plan
panel.comment: Panel used for the definitions of plans.

panel.name: Project
panel.comment: Panel used for the definitions of projects.

panel.name: Server
panel.comment: Panel used for the definitions of servers.

panel.name: Status
panel.comment: Panel used for project statuses.

panel.name: Team
panel.comment: Panel used in order to define a team and its members.

panel.name: Tracking
panel.comment: Panel used for project trackings.

classdefinition.name: Absence
classdefinition.comment: Absence composed by a date and duration.

classdefinition.name: Action
classdefinition.comment: Defines an action or an answer.

classdefinition.name: ActionBar
classdefinition.comment: Defines an action available in the action bar.

classdefinition.name: ActionBarItem
classdefinition.comment: Defines a panel attached to a category.

classdefinition.name: ActionItem
classdefinition.comment: Part of the forecast calendar attached to an action, which contains individual and daily information including date, task and assignment.

classdefinition.name: Actor
classdefinition.comment: Actor definition.

classdefinition.name: Adjustment
classdefinition.comment: Adjustment defined for a workload or for reported duration.

classdefinition.name: Anonymous
classdefinition.comment: Defines an anonymous person assigned to taks in a project plan.

classdefinition.name: Assignment
classdefinition.comment: Defines an assignment in a plan of one taks to an actor or anonymous.

classdefinition.name: Availability
classdefinition.comment: Availability defined for an actor and a project at given dates.

classdefinition.name: BusinessProcess
classdefinition.comment: Defines a business process, which is a list of tasks defined in order to generate projects.

classdefinition.name: Button
classdefinition.comment: Button defined in a panel.

classdefinition.name: ButtonParameter
classdefinition.comment: Button parameters defined in a panel.

classdefinition.name: ClassCode
classdefinition.comment: Code attached to a class definition.

classdefinition.name: ClassControl
classdefinition.comment: Defines some controls to be managed on a class.

classdefinition.name: ClassDefinition
classdefinition.comment: Represents a class definition.

classdefinition.name: ClassItem
classdefinition.comment: Items defined within a class.

classdefinition.name: ClassValue
classdefinition.comment: Defines static values to be used within a class definition.

classdefinition.name: ComboBox
classdefinition.comment: Represents a combobox used to display a list of values.

classdefinition.name: ComboBoxItem
classdefinition.comment: Item that defines a combobox.

classdefinition.name: Constraint
classdefinition.comment: Define constraints between tasks.

classdefinition.name: CoreEntity
classdefinition.comment: Represents an entity managed in core server.

classdefinition.name: Dictionary
classdefinition.comment: Represents an entry in the multi-languages dictionary. An entry is composed by strings in different languages. The system will use English string by default.

classdefinition.name: EMail
classdefinition.comment: Email address.

classdefinition.name: Event
classdefinition.comment: Event attached to a project plan.

classdefinition.name: Forecast
classdefinition.comment: Forecast calendar generated based on a project plan. Contains daily individual assignments, absences and events.

classdefinition.name: ForecastItem
classdefinition.comment: Part of the forecast calendar which contains individual and daily information including date, task and assignment.

classdefinition.name: Grid
classdefinition.comment: Represents a grid used in panels.

classdefinition.name: GridItem
classdefinition.comment: Item defined in a grid.

classdefinition.name: Holiday
classdefinition.comment: Holiday is a duration with a date.

classdefinition.name: HolidaySchedule
classdefinition.comment: Defined by a list of absences.

classdefinition.name: Item
classdefinition.comment: Defines an item, which is an entity, used to create actions or tasks. Contains a type and a level.

classdefinition.name: Location
classdefinition.comment: A location refers to a weekly work schedule template.

classdefinition.name: Member
classdefinition.comment: Defines an actor as member of a team for a period of time.

classdefinition.name: Package
classdefinition.comment: Represents a package used in order to store application definitions.

classdefinition.name: Panel
classdefinition.comment: Represents a panel definition.

classdefinition.name: PanelCode
classdefinition.comment: Code attached to a panel.

classdefinition.name: PanelItem
classdefinition.comment: Item defined within a panel.

classdefinition.name: Phase
classdefinition.comment: Phase attached to a project plan.

classdefinition.name: Plan
classdefinition.comment: Defines a project plan, which is version-based. Includes workloads, constraints, assignments but also anonymous and events.

classdefinition.name: Preference
classdefinition.comment: User preferences. Preferences are stored locally on the system.

classdefinition.name: PreferenceFilter
classdefinition.comment: Information attached to a button.

classdefinition.name: Project
classdefinition.comment: Define a project, which is a scope, a list of tasks (derived from business process) and teams.

classdefinition.name: ProjectTeam
classdefinition.comment: Defines a team as project member.

classdefinition.name: Recipient
classdefinition.comment: Defines an actor as recipient of an action.

classdefinition.name: Risk
classdefinition.comment: Risk attached to a project plan.

classdefinition.name: ScopeItem
classdefinition.comment: Defines an item part of a project scope.

classdefinition.name: Server
classdefinition.comment: Defines a remote server.

classdefinition.name: Skill
classdefinition.comment: Defines a skill with level.

classdefinition.name: Status
classdefinition.comment: Project status. Includes %complete for each task and individual task status.

classdefinition.name: StatusItem
classdefinition.comment: Defines an item of the status, including %complete and confidence for an individual task.

classdefinition.name: Step
classdefinition.comment: Defines a Step, which is an item attached to an action.

classdefinition.name: Task
classdefinition.comment: Defines a task, which is an item attached to a business plan or a project.

classdefinition.name: Team
classdefinition.comment: Defines a team with its members.

classdefinition.name: Tracking
classdefinition.comment: Project tracking.

classdefinition.name: TrackingItem
classdefinition.comment: Tracking item defined for project tracking.

classdefinition.name: Workload
classdefinition.comment: Workload defined for a project task in a plan.

classcode.name: Grid getGrid(TransactionXML transaction)
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the grid attached to the item.

classcode.name: public boolean isAvailable(java.util.Date instant)
classcode.smallcomments: Indicates if the member is available at the instant.

classcode.name: public String getApplication()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the application code.

classcode.name: public String getApplication()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the application code.

classcode.name: public String getApplication()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the application code.

classcode.name: public String getApplication()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the application code.

classcode.name: public String getSummary()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public String getSummary()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public String getSummary()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public String getSummary()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public String getSummaryPrefix()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary prefix when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public String getSummaryPrefix()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary prefix when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public String getSummaryPrefix()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary prefix when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public String getSummaryPrefix()
classcode.smallcomments: Provides a summary prefix when the object is displayed in a list.

classcode.name: public void defaults(TransactionXML transaction)
classcode.smallcomments: Initializes with default values.

classcode.name: String getLabel()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the label.

classcode.name: String getLabel()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the label.

classcode.name: String getTag()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the XML tag.

classcode.name: String getTag()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the XML tag.

classcode.name: String getTag()
classcode.smallcomments: Returns the XML tag.
